hub.title: Language Learning Tools
hub.subtitle: Explore our suite of tools designed to help you master new languages effectively.
hub.myVocabularyDesc: Build and manage your personal vocabulary lists. Save words, generate example sentences, and track your progress.

verbConjugator.title: Verb Conjugator
verbConjugator.description: Master Spanish verb conjugations with our comprehensive conjugation tool.

vocabularyManager.title: Vocabulary Manager
vocabularyManager.description: Build and organize your personal word lists

topicVocabulary.title: Topic Vocabulary
topicVocabulary.description: Learn vocabulary organized by topics and industries that matter to you.

aiLanguageStudy.title: AI Language Study
aiLanguageStudy.description: Learn with AI-generated content, stories, and interactive quizzes.

tips.title: Tips for Effective Learning
tips.tip1Desc: Build a foundation of common words first.
tips.tip2Desc: Short daily sessions beat long weekly ones.
tips.tip3Desc: Learn words in sentences, not isolation.

verbConjugator.title: Spanish Verb Conjugator
verbConjugator.subtitle: Enter any Spanish or English verb to get complete conjugations and example sentences.
verbConjugator.placeholder: e.g., hablar, to speak, como, running...
verbConjugator.noResults: Enter a verb to see its conjugations
verbConjugator.error: Please enter a verb to conjugate
verbConjugator.tip1: You can enter verbs in any form (infinitive, conjugated, English, or Spanish)
verbConjugator.tip2: Try entering "como" to see conjugations of "comer" (to eat)
verbConjugator.tip3: English verbs like "to speak" will be translated to Spanish automatically

vocabularyManager.title: My Vocabulary
vocabularyManager.subtitle: Build and manage your personal vocabulary lists.
vocabularyManager.noListsHint: Click "Add a Word" to create your first list.
vocabularyManager.confirmDeleteWord: Are you sure you want to delete the word
vocabularyManager.confirmDeleteList: Are you sure you want to delete the list
vocabularyManager.deleteAlsoWords: This will also delete all words in this list.
vocabularyManager.selectListGenerate: Select a vocabulary list above, then generate example sentences for all words in the list.
vocabularyManager.emptyList: No words in this list yet.
vocabularyManager.emptyListHint: Click "Add a Word" to get started.
vocabularyManager.selectListToView: Select a list to view words

errors.enterListName: Please enter a vocabulary list name
errors.enterWordToTranslate: Please enter a word to translate
errors.noListSelected: No list is selected. Please click one of your Vocabulary Lists and try again.
errors.noWordsInList: No words in this list. Add some words first.

topicVocabulary.title: Topic Vocabulary
topicVocabulary.subtitle: Learn Spanish vocabulary organized by industry and topic areas.
topicVocabulary.tip1: Select a topic that matches your learning goals or professional field
topicVocabulary.tip2: Use "Custom Topic" to explore any subject not in the list
topicVocabulary.tip3: Copy words to save them to your vocabulary lists

chat.title: Language Learning Assistant
chat.subtitle: Practice conversations in your target language
chat.placeholder: Type your message... (Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line)
chat.startConversationDesc: Ask questions about Spanish, get help with translations, or practice conversations.
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
chat.enterToSend: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
